item.description:
Come and be a part of something amazing! AmpSurf is a group of surfers and other volunteers dedicated to helping the disabled learn how to surf!

Although we started in CA 9 years ago this is our first trip to the east coast and we are landing in York Beach Maine on August 18th and 19th, and we could really use some help both in the water and on land!

Please check us out at www.ampsurf.org or you can contact me directly at gjohnson@ampsurf.org Surfs Up!

Greg AmpSurf is a 501(c)(3) Non-Profit Organization (68-0569858), made up of amputees, veterans, friends and families of the disabled and depend on donations for our operation. Our Goal is to Promote, Inspire, Educate, and Rehabilitate people with disabilities, especially our veteran heroes through adaptive surfing and fun, safe, outdoor activities that all can participate in.
item.name: AmpSurf! Volunteer on August 18th and 19th!
